attributes.action: Halt the 5G rollout & reject ICNIRP assurances over health and the environment
attributes.additional_details:
Research: http://phiremedical.org 
Lancet: https://bit.ly/2LnZXLV 
New research: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/30247338 
Physicians for Safe Tech: https://mdsafetech.org/problems/5g/ 
Prof Martin Pall: https://bit.ly/2FIgWsa 
International appeal: http://www.5gspaceappeal.org/the-appeal   https://bioinitiative.org   https://emfscientist.org/index.php/emf-scientist-appeal 
Climate: https://bit.ly/2CpvpoN 
Brussels ban: https://bit.ly/2XHnn4f 
Bees/butterflies: https://bit.ly/2nYfsPa
attributes.background: 100s of international experts are calling for an urgent ban on 5G due to grave concerns over health and the environment. We do not consent to being exposed 24/7 to significantly increased levels of wireless radiation (including higher frequencies) which has been shown to cause harmful bioeffects.
